proposal: Ever wondered if a chatbot could outwit you while planning your next intergalactic trip? Meet Grok AI, inspired by the Hitchhiker’s Guide, ready to not just answer but suggest the questions you haven't even thought of. Congrats to the 109 holders in the ETH network! Imagine integrating our DEX or Lottery tools, where anyone in your community, not just the team, can deploy and share revenue. Let's make the universe not only a smarter place but also more prosperous.
